text: Dawood (Davhidha) akati (asina kuteerera rimwe divi): “Zvirokwazvo, akakukanganisira nekuda hwai yako kuti awedzere pane hwai dzake. Uye zvirokwazvo vashandi pamwechete (vanoisa upfumi pamwechete) vakawanda vanodzvanyirira vamwe, kusara kwevanotenda uye vachiita mabasa akanaka, uye vashoma.” Uye Dawood (Dhavhidha) akazviona kuti zvirokwazvo tamuedza, uye akabva akumbira ruregerero kuna Tenzi vake, uye akabva apfugama achireurura
